title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1447/86 of 28 April 1986 on the application of Decision No 1/86 of the EEC-Sweden Joint Committee supplementing and amending Lists A and B annexed to Protocol No 3 concerning the definition of the concept of ' originating products' and methods of administrative cooperation
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) N° 1447/86
of 28 April 1986
on the application  of Decision N° 1/86 of the EEC-Sweden Joint Committee supplementing and amending Lists A and B  annexed to Protocol N° 3 concerning the definition of the concept of 'originating products' and  methods of administrative cooperation
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision N° 1/86 of the EEC-Sweden Joint Committee shall apply in the  Community.
The text of the Decision is attached to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 28 April 1986.
For the Council
The President
H. RUDING
(1) OJ N° L 300, 31. 12. 1972, p. 97: English Special  Edition,
31. 12. 1972, p. 99.
